column4: Is there a known issue with power manager and the battery level indicator in lucid?
nm, think I found the bug

perhaps, if you have experience a problem then now we know there's an issue however I would suspect a faulty battery, I get all sorts of weirdness with my battery, the battery is old so I know it's the battery, does the same thing in windows
I don't have the same issue when I boot my windows partition
